content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace (position 2.0, 2.0)

### Electricity Generator at position (0, 0)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine (position x)
- Boiler (position y)
- Offshore Pump (position z)

### Copper Plate Mine at position (x, y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position x1) and a Furnace (position y1)
- Burner Mining Drill (position x2) and a Furnace (position y2)
- Burner Mining Drill (position x3) and a Furnace (position y3)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Check your inventory for required resources before attempting to build or craft items. If resources are lacking, gather more before proceeding.
